name: Tuesday
headline: Scale personalized outreach with AI.
description:
First, build hyper-targeted B2B contact lists without needing any manual verification – we’ll verify the leads for you. Then, generate 1000s of personalized emails that get you 8x more replies within minutes using AI.

**Reach more buyers with Triple-Verified contacts**
Other data providers in the market sell you outdated contacts that waste your time. Tuesday offers unlimited triple-verified emails and mobile phone numbers to you at extremely low cost.All contact data are triple-verified at the time of request, making sure you can reach your buyers easily.

**Book more meetings with AI-Personalized emails**
Stop wasting your precious time “personalizing” emails and LinkedIn messages. You didn’t sign up for this job to read the “About” section of everyone’s LinkedIn profile.Tuesday seamlessly integrates with LinkedIn profile data and uses cutting-edge AI models to generate personalized emails – in seconds.Send hyper-relevant 1:1 messages based on your prospects pain and your company’s offering, automatically.
tags: industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:sales; industry:marketing; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Kai Feng, Founder
founders.description:
Kai (Jiabo) Feng is the founder and CEO of Tuesday.

Prior to that, Kai bootstrapped a B2C mobile subscription app studio as as an indie developer and grew it to 7-figure in annual revenue. 

Kai graduated from Stanford University with a B.S. in Product Design in 2017, and later with a M.S. in Management Science in 2021, in between which he worked as a product manager at Pocket Gems, a mobile gaming company.

# Scale Personalized outreach with Triple-Verified email and mobile number leads
## First, build hyper-targeted B2B contact lists without needing any manual verification – we’ll verify the leads for you. Then, generate 1000s of personalized emails that get you 8x more replies within minutes using AI.
[Get Started Now](https://tuesday.so/<./pricing>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FBk4TYusrituluaMIzKufKi6DY.png)
## Trusted by leading GTM teams around the world
# Reach more buyers with Triple-Verified contacts
## Other data providers in the market sell you outdated contacts that waste your time. Tuesday offers unlimited triple-verified emails and mobile phone numbers to you at extremely low cost.All contact data are triple-verified at the time of request, making sure you can reach your buyers easily.
[Get Started Now](https://tuesday.so/<./pricing>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/GtTPcJkwHPWdjrekjeXeJwYySgc.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/GtTPcJkwHPWdjrekjeXeJwYySgc.png)
### Triple-Verified Phone Numbers
Make cold calls with confidence - knowing you’re getting in touch with the right decision makers.
### (Extremely) Affordable Pricing
Our mobile number cost starts at 15 cents per number, and gets cheaper with larger orders.
### Seamless Integration, Immediate Impact
Export triple-verified emails & phone numbers as CSV file or push directly to your CRM in 30 secs.
# Book more meetings with AI-Personalized emails
## Stop wasting your precious time “personalizing” emails and LinkedIn messages. You didn’t sign up for this job to read the “About” section of everyone’s LinkedIn profile.Tuesday seamlessly integrates with LinkedIn profile data and uses cutting-edge AI models to generate personalized emails – in seconds.Send hyper-relevant 1:1 messages based on your prospects pain and your company’s offering, automatically.
[Get Started Now](https://tuesday.so/<./pricing>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/IrNp9TDNyeObBzI4ZvbIQHnnSTY.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/IrNp9TDNyeObBzI4ZvbIQHnnSTY.png)
### Research buyer’s LinkedIn
Tuesday automatically reads your buyer’s entire LinkedIn, and company website to find relevant insights to mention in its personalization. Just paste in someone’s LinkedIn URL and you get back a fully-personalized email in 3 seconds!
### Persona-based messaging
Think AI is not smart enough to sell based on your buyer persona? Think again! Tuesday allows you to define buyer personas and value proposition for each, so you can pinch their pain points with precision.
### Customize AI tone and knowledge
You can easily choose the right tone of voice, email structure and define your own company knowledge base – add case studies, ROIs, testimonials, etc. Even define your own email structure and let AI follow it precisely.
## Discover Why users love Tuesday.so
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jXUU3ABxbENYra4vNjiux4l04.png)
### Oleg Torgonskiy
Account Executive, DeckRobot
Appreciate your message and product. It’s doing great job on summarizing the lead’s profile and connecting it to the product I promote. I believe you are doing great work and this is definitely the best “message generation” tool i’ve used so far.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/aqQYNZXHVGm2ieptG29wc4wv9g.png)
### Simon Fournier
Chief of Staff at Klark.ai
Tuesday is by far the best AI outreach tool I've seen and I absolutely love the way I've seen it marketed
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/bDJMW5k2TERWlYtJ0S4BXpKbRaE.png)

It'c actually a phenomenal tool!

## Your Essential Toolkit for Sales
## Find key decision makers at ICP companies. Use our unlimited b2b leads.
# Build hyper-targeted contact list
# 🔍 Find your ideal buyers with our user-friendly filters
## Find key decision makers at ICP companies. Use our unlimited b2b lead database of 200M global professional profiles and 70M organizations to reach your entire market!
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/REuQlacKA0PSyq5ojLFvp0Lbmxo.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/REuQlacKA0PSyq5ojLFvp0Lbmxo.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/4gYkMKxmJS2PWrnV3ieG2SOzrnk.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/4gYkMKxmJS2PWrnV3ieG2SOzrnk.png)
# Enrich your list with AI research agent
# 🤖 Automate tasks with AI to save lots of time
## AI agents can research companies and people online to answer any questions, and enrich your records with relevant details in desired format. You can even use these custom fields in AI personalization.
# Triple-verified emails and mobile numbers
# ✅ You can reach prospects with 99.5% success rate
## We use the innovative waterfall approach to aggregate the best results from multiple data providers. All results must go through our Triple-verification process. Only valid results are charged.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/4qlIKjfDtFeBZ6hR6bWNxsOZos.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/4qlIKjfDtFeBZ6hR6bWNxsOZos.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/9IF263QV9gWcC52ILWUeZcf1Wc.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/9IF263QV9gWcC52ILWUeZcf1Wc.png)
# Write personalized emails with AI
# 💌 Personalized emails get your 8x more replies
## Tuesday’s AI sales email agent writes personalized emails relevant to the buyer’s specific pain points using your custom knowledge base. Easily scale your outreach to 1000s of emails in a few minutes. Never manually write “personalized” messages again!
# Easy integrations with CRMs and email platforms
# ⏱️ Rapid integration, seamless workflows
## Send personalized AI emails and LinkedIn messages automatically using your favorite sending tool, CRM, or even Google. We can automate push leads into Smartlead, Instantly, Apollo.io, HubSpot, Salesforce, etc. You can also export all data as CSV file.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FVzZKAB4yQezfmZbdqk4flGjYI.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FVzZKAB4yQezfmZbdqk4flGjYI.png)
# Join us and accelerate your growth today!
# Join us and accelerate your growth today!
## Discover the difference with Tuesday – where lead generation meets data quality, performance guarantee, and cutting-edge AI technology.
[Get Started Now](https://tuesday.so/<./pricing>)
## Supercharge your outbound marketing efforts
Advanced lead filters to build hyper-targeted lead list.
Automated email and phone verification for seamless outreach
Scalable AI email writer to generate 1000s of personalizations in minutes
Integrate with CRMs and email sending tools in a few clicks
User-friendly interface to get your job done easily

### Research buyer’s LinkedIn
Tuesday automatically reads your buyer’s entire LinkedIn, and company website to find relevant insights to mention in its personalization. Just paste in someone’s LinkedIn URL and you get back a fully-personalized email in 3 seconds!
### Persona-based messaging
Think AI is not smart enough to sell based on your buyer persona? Think again! Tuesday allows you to define buyer personas and value proposition for each, so you can pinch their pain points with precision.
### Customize AI tone and knowledge
You can easily choose the right tone of voice, email structure and define your own company knowledge base – add case studies, ROIs, testimonials, etc. Even define your own email structure and let AI follow it precisely.

## Your Essential Toolkit for Sales
## Find key decision makers at ICP companies. Use our unlimited b2b leads.
# Build hyper-targeted contact list
# 🔍 Find your ideal buyers with our user-friendly filters
## Find key decision makers at ICP companies. Use our unlimited b2b lead database of 200M global professional profiles and 70M organizations to reach your entire market!

# Enrich your list with AI research agent
# 🤖 Automate tasks with AI to save lots of time
## AI agents can research companies and people online to answer any questions, and enrich your records with relevant details in desired format. You can even use these custom fields in AI personalization.
# Triple-verified emails and mobile numbers
# ✅ You can reach prospects with 99.5% success rate
## We use the innovative waterfall approach to aggregate the best results from multiple data providers. All results must go through our Triple-verification process. Only valid results are charged.

# Write personalized emails with AI
# 💌 Personalized emails get your 8x more replies
## Tuesday’s AI sales email agent writes personalized emails relevant to the buyer’s specific pain points using your custom knowledge base. Easily scale your outreach to 1000s of emails in a few minutes. Never manually write “personalized” messages again!
# Easy integrations with CRMs and email platforms
# ⏱️ Rapid integration, seamless workflows
## Send personalized AI emails and LinkedIn messages automatically using your favorite sending tool, CRM, or even Google. We can automate push leads into Smartlead, Instantly, Apollo.io, HubSpot, Salesforce, etc. You can also export all data as CSV file.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FVzZKAB4yQezfmZbdqk4flGjYI.png)

generated_description:
**Tuesday: Revolutionizing B2B Outreach with AI**

**Company Overview:**
Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator Batch W22, Tuesday is based in San Francisco and consists of a lean team of three. With a mission to scale personalized outreach using AI, Tuesday primarily targets the B2B market, providing a solution that not only builds contact lists but also generates highly personalized emails that dramatically increase response rates.

**What They Do:**
Tuesday stands out in a crowded market of data providers by ensuring that all contacts are triple-verified at the time of request. This means businesses receive accurate, reliable emails and mobile numbers without the hassle of manual verification. The platform truly shines when it comes to email personalization; it uses advanced AI to craft individual messages tailored to prospects' pain points, yielding up to eight times more replies.

**Key Features:**
1. **Triple-Verified Contacts:** Unlike competitors who sell outdated or questionable data, Tuesday provides unlimited access to triple-verified emails and phone numbers, ensuring contact accuracy and saving users valuable time.
   
2. **AI-Personalized Emails:** Say goodbye to the tedious task of personalizing emails for each lead. Tuesday automatically pulls data from LinkedIn, using AI to generate relevant email content in seconds. Users can focus on what matters most: closing deals.

3. **Seamless Integrations:** The platform allows easy integration with popular CRMs and email tools, enabling users to push verified contacts directly into their systems efficiently.

4. **Affordable Pricing:** With costs starting as low as 15 cents per mobile number, Tuesday positions itself as a budget-friendly alternative to more established services like Apollo.io and ZoomInfo.

5. **User-Friendly Interface:** The site’s design is intuitive, enabling users to generate targeted lead lists and personalized emails quickly without extensive training or complex setups.

**Client Success Stories:**
Users have praised Tuesday for dramatically improving their outreach efficiency. For example, one business reported a 60% increase in booked meetings after switching to Tuesday. Clients have described it as the best message generation tool they've used, highlighting its effectiveness in combining data-driven insights with personal touch.

**Conclusion:**
Tuesday is more than just another AI tool; it’s a comprehensive solution for businesses looking to supercharge their outreach efforts. By combining high-quality data with innovative technology, Tuesday empowers sales teams to connect meaningfully with their prospects—making it a must-have in the modern sales toolkit. 

For more information and to get started with your free trial, visit [Tuesday's website](https://tuesday.so).
